mapper.select: select tom.channel_gb channelGb ,tom.order_id orderId ,tom.order_date orderDate ,tom.channel_order_no channelOrderNo ,tom.cust_id custId ,tom.cust_pcode custPcode ,tom.order_name custNm ,tom.order_tel custTel ,tom.order_tel custHp ,tm.cust_zipcode custZipcode ,tom.order_addr1 custAddr1 ,tom.order_addr2 custAddr2 -- ,tma.deli_nm deliNm ,tma.deli_tel deliTel ,tma.deli_hp deliHp ,tma.deli_zipcode deliZipcode ,tma.deli_addr1 deliAddr1 ,tma.deli_addr2 deliAddr2 ,tom.pay_gb payGb ,tom.order_amt orderAmt ,tom.total_goods_price totalGoodsPrice ,tom.total_delivery_charge totalDeliveryCharge ,0.0 totalDiscountPrice ,0.0 totalUseMileage from tb_order_master tom ,tb_member tm ,tb_member_address tma where tom.order_id =#{orderId} and tom.cust_id = tm.cust_id and tom.deli_id = tma.deli_id

select tod.order_id orderId ,tod.order_seq orderSeq ,concat(tod.order_id,'-',tod.order_seq) orderKey ,tod.channel_order_no channelOrderNo ,tod.channel_order_seq channelOrderSeq ,tod.status_cd statusCd ,tod.assort_id assortId ,tod.item_id itemId ,tod.goods_nm goodsNm ,tod.option_info optionInfo , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=tod.assort_id And b2.item_id= tod.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb1 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq1=b1.seq) optionNm1 , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=tod.assort_id And b2.item_id= tod.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb2 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq2=b1.seq) optionNm2 , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=tod.assort_id And b2.item_id= tod.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb3 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq3=b1.seq) optionNm3 ,tod.qty qty ,tod.sale_price salePrice ,tod.delivery_info deliveryInfo ,case when tod.scm_no = 64 then '공급사' when tod.scm_no = 63 then '공급사' else '본사' end scmType ,tod.deli_price deliPrice ,tod.deli_method deliMethod ,tod.list_image_data listImageData from tb_order_detail tod ,tb_order_master tom where tod.order_id = #{orderId} and tod.order_id = tom.order_id

select aa.seq seq ,aa.if_dt ifDt ,'01' channelGb ,bb.order_id orderId ,bb.order_seq orderSeq ,bb.status_cd statusCd ,bb.channel_order_no channelOrderNo ,bb.channel_order_seq channelOrderSeq ,bb.assort_id assortId ,bb.item_id itemId ,bb.goods_nm goodsNm ,cc.order_name orderName , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=bb.assort_id And b2.item_id= bb.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb1 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq1=b1.seq) optionNm1 , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=bb.assort_id And b2.item_id= bb.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb2 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq2=b1.seq) optionNm2 , (select b1.option_nm from ititmm b2, itvari b1 where b2.assort_id=bb.assort_id And b2.item_id= bb.item_id And b2.assort_id = b1.assort_id and b2.variation_gb3 = b1.variation_gb and b2.variation_seq3=b1.seq) optionNm3 ,aa.if_status ifStatus ,aa.if_msg ifMsg from if_order_cancel aa ,tb_order_detail bb, tb_order_master cc where 1=1 and aa.if_dt between #{startDt} and #{endDt} and aa.if_status =#{ifStatus} and aa.channel_order_no = bb.channel_order_no and aa.channel_order_seq = bb.channel_order_seq and bb.order_id = cc.order_id
and cc.order_name =#{orderName}

select aaa.status_b02 purchaseCompleteDt ,bbb.make_complete_dt makeCompleteDt ,bbb.shipment_dt shipmentDt ,bbb.esti_arrv_dt estiArrvDt ,aaa.status_X01 cancelDt from ( select min(case when status_cd ='B02' then eff_start_dt end) status_B02 ,min(case when status_cd ='X01' then eff_start_dt end) status_X01 from tb_order_history toh where toh.order_id = #{orderId} and toh.order_seq =#{orderSeq} ) aaa, (select max(lm.shipment_dt) shipment_dt ,max(lm.esti_arrv_dt) esti_arrv_dt ,max(case when lm.shipment_dt is not null then date_add(lm.shipment_dt,interval -30 day ) end) make_complete_dt from lsshpd ld ,lsshpm lm where 1=1 and ld.order_id = #{orderId} and ld.order_seq =#{orderSeq} and ld.ship_id =lm.ship_id and lm.ship_gb='02' and lm.ship_status <> 'X1' ) bbb

select tom.channel_gb channelGb ,tom.order_date orderDate ,tom.order_id orderId ,tod.order_seq orderSeq ,case when SUBSTR(order_status FROM 1 FOR 1) in ('s','d','g','p') then '결제완료' when SUBSTR(order_status FROM 1 FOR 1) ='o' then '결제전' else '결제실패 및 취소' end payStatus ,tom.channel_order_no channelOrderNo ,tod.channel_order_seq channelOrderSeq ,tom.cust_id custId ,tom.order_name custNm ,tom.order_hp custHp ,tom.order_tel custTel ,tod.goods_nm goodsNm ,ita.assort_id assortId ,itm.item_id itemId ,tod.status_cd orderStatus ,(select iv.option_nm from itvari iv where iv.assort_id = itm.assort_id and iv.seq = itm.variation_seq1 and iv.variation_gb='01' and del_yn='02' ) optionNm1 ,(select iv.option_nm from itvari iv where iv.assort_id = itm.assort_id and iv.seq = itm.variation_seq2 and iv.variation_gb='02' and del_yn='02' ) optionNm2 ,(select iv.option_nm from itvari iv where iv.assort_id = itm.assort_id and iv.seq = itm.variation_seq3 and iv.variation_gb='03' and del_yn='03' ) optionNm3 ,tod.qty qty ,tod.goods_price goodsPrice ,tod.deli_price deliPrice ,tod.deli_method deliMethod ,tod.delivery_info deliveryInfo ,tod.scm_no scmNo ,tom.total_goods_price totalGoodsPrice ,tom.total_delivery_charge totalDeliveryCharge ,tom.total_goods_price + tom.total_delivery_charge totalPrice ,tom.order_amt orderAmt ,tom.pay_gb payGb ,tom.pay_dt payDt -- ,tma.deli_nm deliNm ,tma.deli_nm deliNm ,tma.deli_hp deliHp ,tma.deli_tel deliTel ,tma.deli_addr1 deliAddr from tb_order_detail tod inner join tb_order_master as tom on tom.order_id = tod.order_id JOIN itasrt as ita on tod.assort_id = ita.assort_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ititmm as itm on tod.assort_id = itm.assort_id and tod.item_id = itm.item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member AS tm -- A_TABLE 기준 ON tom.cust_id = tm.cust_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member_address AS tma -- A_TABLE 기준 ON tom.deli_id = tma.deli_id where 1=1 and tom.order_date between #{startDt} and #{endDt} and ita.assort_nm like '%Saarinen%198%'
